name: I Didn't Really Like It Before
name_original: I Didn't Really Like It Before
description:
When I was five my family went to a restaurant in the Haight that no longer exists. My mom gave me a shrimp since I had never eaten one before and I was not an incurious child. As soon as that foul creature passed between my lips I ran to the nearest bathroom, sobbing as I threw up.

This isn't like that.
